name: Theater's Life
description:
Theater’s Life is a point & click video game set in a puppet theater.

All the stages and plays depicted are inspired by real life natural disaster that took place in Italy in the recent history, with their dire consequences.

A simple story about people and their actions.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY

In this game you play as the Mannequin, a puppet without a precise identity or notable features.

The game is played only with the use of a mouse. 

You can move the Mannequin around by left clicking, if the selected point is accessible, he will reach it automatically. 

You can also interact with other characters, elements of the environment and pick up items with the left click. Any collected item is stored in the top middle of the screen, where you can equip them, with a left click, or remove them, with a right click. 

Equipped items will move along with your cursor and play a key role to solve the puzzles throughout the game.

Take your seat now, the lights are out, enjoy the show!
